intro: ^You're back! I'm grateful that you could return to us, at least. What did you find?
^Here's what I found. Papers and maps, mostly. Plans for something even those bastards didn't seem to understand.
^But... there was no one left. I'm sorry.
^...I see. Well, I cannot thank you enough for trying. It's more than I could do. Now if you'd be so kind, I need some time to myself.
